{"id":953449215,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1684514080,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/953449215/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make Array Empty","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countOperationsToEmptyArray(int[] nums){\n      long ans=0;\n      HashMap<Integer,Integer> hm= new HashMap<>();\n         int[] copy= new int[nums.length];\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            hm.put(nums[i],i);\n            copy[i]=nums[i];\n        }\n       Arrays.sort(copy);\n        for(int i=0;i<copy.length;i++){\n            copy[i]=Math.abs(hm.get(copy[i])-i);\n        }\n        List<Integer> smaller=countSmaller(nums);\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            ans+=copy[i]-smaller.get(i)+1;\n        }\n        return ans;\n       \n        \n    }\n   \n    public List<Integer> countSmaller(int[] nums) {\n        int min = 20001;\n        int max = -1;\n        for (int num : nums) {\n            min = Math.min(min, num);\n            max = Math.max(max, num);\n        }\n        \n        min--;\n        int[] count = new int[max-min+1];\n        Integer[] result = new Integer[nums.length];\n        for (int i = nums.length-1; i >=0; i--) {\n            int k = nums[i]-min-1;\n            int c = 0;\n            do {\n                c += count[k];\n                k -= (-k&k);\n            } while (k > 0);\n            result[i] = c;\n            \n            k = nums[i]-min;\n            while (k < count.length) {\n                count[k]++;\n                k += (-k&k);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return Arrays.asList(result);\n    \n}\n\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-array-empty","has_notes":false}
